title: Refined Retreat in the Heart of Montpellier
description: Crowne Plaza Montpellier - Corum, an IHG Hotel, is an elegant and modern refuge sheltered from the hustle and bustle of this historic yet cosmopolitan city. Mediterranean cuisine awaits at the stylish Maxens restaurant or head out into this dynamic city to find fine dining, picturesque cafes and stunning architecture and culture. Invigorate body and mind in the fitness centre, take a refreshing dip in the pool or retreat to a stylish guest room to enjoy charming views of this delightful region.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Montpellier - Corum, an IHG Hotel

title: Stylish Boutique Montpellier Escape near Place de la Comédie
description:
Immerse yourself in the vibrant heart of Montpellier with a stay at a contemporary retreat located in the city's bustling Comédie district. A stone's throw from the grand Place de la Comédie and the Esplanade Charles-de-Gaulle, this hotel offers easy access to the city's historic centre, brimming with medieval architecture, charming boutiques and inviting cafes.

Explore the city's rich history with a visit to the Musée Fabre, one of France's most prestigious art museums, or take a leisurely stroll through the picturesque Jardin des Plantes de Montpellier. When hunger strikes, head to the nearby Marché du Lez, a dynamic food and cultural market, for a taste of local cuisine.

title: Stylish Southern France Escape near Odysseum Shopping Centre & Airport
description: Discover the elegance of Southern France with Holiday Inn Express Montpellier - Odysseum, an IHG Hotel, located in one of the country's largest coastal cities. With baroque architecture, historic monuments, and verdant gardens sprinkled throughout, this Mediterranean hub offers plenty for the cultured traveller. Start each morning with a light continental breakfast in the hotel's lobby, and cool off in the evening with a glass of wine from the bar and a dip in the outdoor pool.
location_description: Holiday Inn Express Montpellier - Odysseum, an IHG Hotel
